find:
{{ phrase('points') }}
{$user.trophy_points|number}
replace:
$0

<dl class="pairs pairs--rows pairs--rows--centered">
		<dt title="{{ phrase('xentrader_feedback_received') }}">{{ phrase('xentrader_feedback') }}</dt>
		<dd>
			{{ $user.Feedback.positive }} / {{ $user.Feedback.neutral }} / {{ $user.Feedback.negative }}
		</dd>
	</dl>
